label: Title
tooltip: The name of the IATI activity

label: Reported by
tooltip: The name of the organisation that published this IATI data

label: Implemented by
tooltip: The name of the organisation(s) implementing this activity

label: Country/Region
tooltip: The name of the country or region for this activity. Note: when an IATI activity has multiple country/regions, the first ten countries/regions will be displayed here. You can download the detailed data from the Download link above.

label: Total Amount (USD)
tooltip: The total sum of the commitment transactions for this activity

label: Covid-19-specific (USD)
tooltip: The total sum of commitment transactions that are specifically flagged as COVID-19 related.

label: Humanitarian?
tooltip: Whether this activity is flagged as being humanitarian
